actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the exclusion for employer-provided educational assistance, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Employer-Provided Tuition Assistance Act of 1990 - Repeals provisions of the Internal Revenue Code that: (1) terminated the income tax exclusion of amounts paid under employee educational assistance programs as of tax year 1989; and (2) deny benefits in connection with graduate work. Increases the maximum amount of such tax exclusion. Provides a cost-of-living adjustment of such tax exclusion after calendar year 1991.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the exclusion for employer-provided educational assistance, and for other purposes.
